main event: A witness reported sighting a very faint rectangular object that appeared as a point of light, increased in size, and then dimmed before disappearing.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 10 minutes., The object was initially observed at 1825 hours., The witness first thought the object was a shooting star before realizing it was stationary., There was no sound associated with the sighting., A second witness described the object as triangular with a bluish-white glow.
sighted object: faint rectangular object and triangular object with bluish-white glow
witness description: One witness was an electrical foreman who described lights and objects flying rapidly.
